        public Trajectory read(java.lang.String fname,
                       boolean append)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a trajectory from a dcd file
        Parameters:
        fname - The name of the file
        append - true for append mode (default = true)
        Returns:
        A trajectory read from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the IO error happened

      • read

        public Trajectory read(java.lang.String fname)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a trajectory from a dcd file. Note that the trajectory is read in an append mode.
        Parameters:
        fname - The name of the file
        Returns:
        A trajectory read from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the IO error happened
